subtitle: The combination of flavours, colours and textures is quite exquisite.

method.text: Place all the dressing ingredients in a food processor or blender. Blend until smooth. Transfer to a container with a lid. Chill for 2-1 days.
Cut the top off the melon. Remove seeds from the centre. Scoop out the flesh with a melon baller or teaspoon. Put in a serving bowl with the other prepared fruits.
Pour a little dressing over the fruit. Serve with remaining dressing in a jug.

title: Fruits with a sweet and sour dressing
